Metadata.description: At Travel Like a Local Japan, experience the true essence of Japan beyond typical tourist spots. With insights from a nomadic worker's perspective, we offer deep connections to nature-rich areas and local communities, making you the protagonist of your journey.
Metadata.keywords: Japan Private Tour, Japan Private Guide
Metadata.creator: Travel Like a Local Japan Team
Metadata.manifestDescription: Discover the essence of Japan with our comprehensive travel guide. From must-see attractions to hidden gems, explore cultural insights and travel tips for an unforgettable journey.

Hero.title: Explore Japan Like a <emphasis> Local</emphasis>
Hero.subtitle: Discover hidden gems and local experiences in Japan.

ArticleList.title: Latest Articles
ArticleList.description: Discover {region} {category} articles and travel guides on Travel Like a Local in Japan.

BookmarksPage.title: Your Bookmarks
BookmarksPage.noBookmarks: No bookmarks yet, add articles to your bookmarks by clicking the button in the top right of the article
BookmarksPage.description: View and manage your saved articles

PrefecturesMapPage.title: Explore Articles by Prefecture
PrefecturesMapPage.selectPrefecturePrompt: Select a prefecture on the map to see related articles.
PrefecturesMapPage.metadataDescription: Explore Japan articles by prefecture using an interactive map. Find travel guides and tips for specific regions.
